snippet.title: DB drop and new
snippet.content: rails db:drop && rails db:create && rails db:migrate && rails db:seed

snippet.title: Upcoming shipments Download
snippet.content: heroku run rails export:shipments -a vetpost-eu | tee shipments.csv
